title: Two new Ministerial portfolios gazetted
body_lines: An extraordinary gazette notification was issued with amendment to the duties and functions of the Ministries of Technology and Investment Promotion and Women, Child Affairs and Social Empowerment.

The gazette was published by by President Gotabaya Rajapaksa, amending a previous gazette notification issued by him on May 27 and with effect from today (June 10) by virtue of the powers vested in him under paragraph (1) (a) of Article 44 of the Constitution.
